resources.string: Liberate.Te needs to be configured\nPlease follow steps below:\n

Remote Control Commands:

PASSWORD WIPE - wipe your device

PASSWORD FULL WIPE - wipe your device + SD card


To disable Liberate.Te, follow steps below:

Open Settings app

Open Security 

Open Device administrators

Disable device admin for Liberate.Te

Uninstall Liberate.Te via android package managed
Please note: app would save original password (internally), not its hash.
Password is tooo short! Min 4 chars, recommended at least 7.
Entered password is shorter than 7 symbols. Are you sure to use short password? Short password makes it easier to guess your password and wipe your device remotely.

DISCLAIMER
By using this application you agree that you understand that main purpose of this application is to perform device factory reset, this would erase everything on your device!
Beware of accidental triggering this function and make sure no one knows your password, so no one could remotely wipe your device.
Author of this application takes no responsibility for accidental data loss.
Software came with NO WARRANTY.
Before using this application you must agree with this disclaimer.
Launcher icon disabled. Reboot the device.

WARNING: The password is stored UNENCRYPTED!\nNever ever use the same password in any other place\nAlso \'command\' message will be visible same as regular SMS, so make sure to never re-use the same password again after triggering the remote wipe once.
These permissions are required for app to work
